name: Eunike
greetingText: I really like your name (and also the person btw lol)
wishText:
Yun, Even though miles may stand between us, and the days may feel long, I know that the Lord will never be far from us. His love unites us, even in this distance. 
I love you more than words can say. -JustinKP
textInChatBox: Happy birthday yaa!! WUATB + Sehat selalu, blah, blah, bla...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something special and
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText:
Or click, if you want to watch it again.
